name: Bomber Escape (ricardo_sdl)
description:
A simple game. Escape trough the levels as far as you can go. Be careful with your own power!

Entry for the game jam: https://itch.io/jam/jam-for-all-basic-dialects-3

Source code is available here: https://github.com/ricardosdl/BasicJam3

https://opengameart.org/content/boss-theme-1

https://sfxr.me/

https://sfbgames.itch.io/chiptone

Controls: Arrow keys to move, Z to drop bombs.
